title: Reactions to racist posts on social media in the U.S. 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Ignore the post and lowest at Response Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.).
The highest Response Ignore the post has 34.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.).
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.

The maximum Share of respondents 40.0 is found at Response Ignore the post and the minimum is found at Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.) where Response is 6.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Ignore the post and lowest at Response Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.).
The highest Response Ignore the post has 34.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.).
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response Ignore the post has the highest Share of respondents and Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.) has the lowest Share of respondents.
The second highest Share of respondents is appeared to be the Response Unfollow/unfriend the poster.
There is a difference of 34.0 between the maximum Response Ignore the post and minimum Response Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.).

The Response Ignore the post has the highest Share of respondents, followed by Unfollow/unfriend the poster, and Comment on/ reply to the post. Down to the Response Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.) which is the lowest.
The Response Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.) has 1.98 times less Share of respondents than average.
The Share of respondents is 101.0 if we add up values of all Responses.

data.Response: Comment on/ reply to the post
Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.)
